name: Oxygen Regulator
specification: Pressure gauge, adjustable flow meter, equipped with a durable neoprene diaphragm and sintered filter for safety; standard DISS or CGA connections for oxygen tanks.
function: Controls and regulates the flow and pressure of oxygen delivered from a tank to the patient, ensuring safe and precise oxygen therapy.
usage: Attach securely to oxygen tank valve; adjust the flow rate using the flow meter to the prescribed level; continuously monitor pressure gauges and patient status.
maintenance: Regularly inspect for leaks and damage; clean pressure gauge and regulator body; replace filters and diaphragms as recommended; verify connections are secure before each use.
warning: Incorrect assembly or improper flow setting can cause oxygen delivery hazards; ensure correct attachment and monitor flow; avoid oil or grease contamination on regulator components.
